attributes.additional_details: where is our once proud navy  in an state due to bad gov policys .i suggest rerubishing or building new navy dock for the building off navy vessels and carriers also norm ships which we could bid for world wide . start to focus on the skills and man/women power  needed at uk schools so we can keep them going for future .we need an carrier group off our own at the moment  we got no carrier that an plane can land on where an island and need its own navy defense force for home and nato . we should once again have an navy that can  fill all its required to do .
